<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Acidic Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=2340)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 256

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Geryon](/Deities.aspx?ID=398), [Oaur-Ooung](/Deities.aspx?ID=585)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot [emanation](/Rules.aspx?ID=2387)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You create a shell of [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524) around yourself that immediately bursts outward, dealing 2d6 acid damage to each creature in the area with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Acidic Burst
